name: Public Enemy Escapade
description:
A certain Strange and Villainous cyclops  wants YOU to impress him, but if you fail to do so.. you may be added to his kill count.

Can you create the perfect hangout? Can you ensure your survival..?

That all depends on how successful this hangout is...

Maybe he can be cool and fun...?

This game has 7 total endings, and an animated cutscene. If you to get all the possible endings, the game is around 1 - 2 hours long.

You can find more of my art / characters / projects here:

Instagram - Webcomic -Youtube

WARNINGS: This game contains depictions of violence, blood, etc. And mature themes
